Title: Pocket Book
Description: A WPF version of the popular PocketMod utility.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A standalone WPF version of the popular PocketMod utility.


 

This was developed as a hobby project with the following requirements in mind:

  • to have a standalone version of the application (PocketMod is only available online);
  • the ability to print to A4 pages;
  • the ability to save layouts;
  • the ability to add new templates as required.

Credits
